summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding an unredacted, publicly filed bail opinion related to case 20cr330, thanking recipients for their help.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email forwarding the bail opinion and thanking recipients for their help.

events.title: Bail Opinion Filed
events.description: A publicly filed bail opinion was issued in case 20cr330, which ended up having no redactions.

keyFacts: A bail opinion was publicly filed in case 20cr330 on or around December 28, 2020.
The bail opinion contained no redactions.
The document was shared by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email suggests collaboration on the bail opinion matter, thanking recipients for their help.
